[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [Variables](./blockly.variables_namespace.md) &gt; [getVariable](./blockly.variables_namespace.getvariable_1_function.md)

## Variables.getVariable() function

Look up a variable on the given workspace. Always looks in the main workspace before looking in the flyout workspace. Always prefers lookup by ID to lookup by name + type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getVariable(workspace: Workspace, id: string | null, opt_name?: string, opt_type?: string): IVariableModel<IVariableState> | null;
```

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

workspace


</td><td>

[Workspace](./blockly.workspace_class.md)


</td><td>

The workspace to search for the variable. It may be a flyout workspace or main workspace.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

id


</td><td>

string \| null


</td><td>

The ID to use to look up the variable, or null.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

opt\_name


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The string to use to look up the variable. Only used if lookup by ID fails.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

opt\_type


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The type to use to look up the variable. Only used if lookup by ID fails.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[IVariableModel](./blockly.ivariablemodel_interface.md)<!-- -->&lt;[IVariableState](./blockly.ivariablestate_interface.md)<!-- -->&gt; \| null

The variable corresponding to the given ID or name + type combination, or null if not found.
